# JPKIPassContents.UserIdentity.AuthenticationType.systemBiometric

**Case**

Authentication using biometric information.

## Declaration

```swift
case systemBiometric
```

## Discussion

Use of the systemBiometric authentication requires you to set the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/NSFaceIDUsageDescription] usage description.

## Types of authentication

- **JPKIPassContents.UserIdentity.AuthenticationType.pin(_:)**: The PIN associated with the user identity.

items.description: The PIN associated with the user identity.
items.name: JPKIPassContents.UserIdentity.AuthenticationType.pin(_:)
